item.description:
Boston Fashion Industry Meetup is a focal point for the fashion industry in the Northeast, with people coming to Meetups or asking for information - from New York, Connecticut, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, Florida, and internationally. We have great networking with diverse fashion people attaining benefits from one another. There are experts giving advice in every aspect of the industry, and some are continually creating innovative projects for us to work on collaboratively to become successful. We have a great Networking Database started that will grow to become involved to help you network all over the world. RSVP our next Meetup, and be sure to honor your comittment to come. We get very angry when you RSVP Yes, and don't come. PLEASE CHANGE YOUR RSVP TO NO IF YOU CAN'T COME. We want to meet all of you, and see what we can do to help one another succeed in a sometimes difficult industry.

Please make sure you give us your profile if you are an older member before we required members to apply and be accepted. It is very important in order to classify you according to your fashion products, servives or even your aspirations, and to properly set up our Meetups. There are many people looking for fashion people in all aspects of the industry. Let them know what you do so they can find you in our Network Database..

For more information, see http://www.shirleywil...
item.name: The Boston Fashion Industry August Meetup
